quote: This was amazing! Jason our guide knew so much about the Bronco and I was in awe of what the Bronco could do off road!!
The staff was excellent, and our trail guide Jason was exceptionally knowledgeable and caring.
We loved our experience in New Hampshire! We learned a lot and our guide, Jason, was great.
Jason was very patient and calm during the experience, which helped me feel more confident during the experience for a first time off roading.

Jason was our guide for the off-roading course and he was fantastic! I have a much more comprehensive  understanding of the intricacies of off roading. The other guide were also very knowledgeable and enthusiastic. The entire team made it a wonderful experience and I feel more confidant  off road now. Thanks for a great time!!
Fantastic experience. Jason was very knowledgable, great teacher and allowed us to learn by experiencing it for ourselves. Overall great experience!
Trail guides Evan and Jason were extremely knowledgeable, personable, and entertaining!  I would highly recommend off rodeo to anyone interested in off roading.
Our guide Jason was amazing! I think he made the experience top notch!
Loved our time there and our guide Jason was fun and very informative.
Our guide Jason was outstanding! Very patient and knowlegeable.

Even though I was terrified, this was so awesome.  I loved my guides - Jason, Jordan and Evan. They were all very knowledgeable. I now know how to do some great 4x4 tricks if I ever need to.   Thank you to Jason for letting me ride in the lead Bronco with him.  It sure eased my mind. And my family is amazed at the picture I sent of myself, heading down over some rocks, tipped up on 3 wheels. I told them I guess you really only need 3.
Evan and Jason were nothing short of awesome.  Learned so much about my new car, thanks!!!
